an5.143:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Vesālī, at the Great Wood, in the hall with the peaked roof.
an5.143:4.2: Then the Buddha got dressed in the morning and, taking his bowl and robes, entered Vesālī for alms.
an5.143:4.3: Now at that time five hundred Licchavis were sitting together at the Sārandada shrine, and this discussion came up among them:
an5.143:4.4: “The appearance of five treasures is rare in the world.
an5.143:4.6: The elephant treasure, the horse treasure, the gem treasure, the woman treasure, and the householder treasure.
an5.143:4.7: The appearance of these five treasures is rare in the world.”
an5.143:5.1: Then those Licchavis sent a man out on to the road.
an5.143:5.2: “Mister, please tell us when you see the Buddha.”
an5.143:5.3: That man saw the Buddha coming off in the distance.
an5.143:5.4: Seeing this, he went to the Licchavis
an5.143:5.6: “Sirs, the Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha is coming.
an5.143:6.1: Then those Licchavis went up to the Buddha,
an5.143:7.1: “Please go to the Sārandada shrine, out of compassion.”
an5.143:7.3: Then the Buddha went up to the Sārandada shrine,
an5.143:7.4: where he sat on the indicated seat,
an5.143:7.6: “Wanderers, what were you sitting talking about just now? What conversation was unfinished?”
an5.143:7.7: “Well, Master Gotama, this discussion came up among us while we were sitting together:
an5.143:7.8: ‘The appearance of five treasures is rare in the world. …’”
an5.143:8.1: “You Licchavis are so fixated on sensual pleasures, that’s the only discussion that came up!
an5.143:8.2: Licchavis, the appearance of five treasures is rare in the world.
an5.143:8.4: The appearance of a Realized One, a Perfect One, a fully awakened Buddha. A person who explains the teaching and training announced by a Realized One. A person who understands the teaching and training announced by a Realized One. A person who practises in line with the teaching. A person who is grateful and thankful.
an5.143:8.5: The appearance of these five treasures is rare in the world.”
